# Lépine Apartments

- [Luxury Apartment Rentals](https://www.lepineapartments.com/): Discover affordable luxury apartments with exceptional amenities in Ottawa.

## About Lépine Apartments

- [About Lépine Apartments](https://www.lepineapartments.com/about): Family-owned apartments offering sustainable, quality living in Ontario.
- [Careers at Lépine](https://www.lepineapartments.com/careers): Explore career opportunities and benefits at Lépine Apartments.

## Lépine Hero's Ridge

- [Hero's Ridge Initiative](https://www.lepineapartments.com/herosridge): Honoring Canadian veterans through community engagement and support.

## Lépine Commercial

- [Commercial Leasing Opportunities](https://www.lepineapartments.com/commercial): Discover customizable commercial spaces in Kanata's vibrant retail hub.

## Lépine Properties

- [40 McGill Apartments - Stylish and Spacious Living in Smith Falls](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/40mcgill): Live in luxury at 40 McGill. Stylish, spacious loft style apartments located in Smith Falls.
- [Experience Refined Living at Carré Saint Louis](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/carresaintlouis): Welcome to Kanata’s newest resort-style community, where timeless elegance meets modern convenience. Building on the success of The Normand and Saint Emilion, is the latest addition to Lépine’s exceptional portfolio in this vibrant neighbourhood.
- [Howard Grant - Barrhaven Apartment Rentals](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/Howard Grant): Enjoy upscale living at Howard Grant. Spacious, elegant apartments in Barrhaven with exceptional amenities.
- [Johanne's Court Apartments - Luxury Living in Carleton Place with Premium Amenities](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/johannescourt): Discover luxury living at Johannes Court. Stylish apartments with premium amenities, located in beautiful Carleton Place.
- [Johanne's Gardens | Lepine Apartments](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/johannesgardens): Discover luxury living at Johannes Gardens. Stylish apartments with premium amenities, located in beautiful Carleton Place.
- [Lépine Lodge Apartments - Luxury Living with Premium Amenities in Renfrew](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/lepinelodge): Experience high-end living at Lépine Lodge. Luxury apartments with premium amenities, located in Renfrew.
- [Saint Émilion Apartments - Luxury Living with Top Amenities in Kanata](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/saintemilion): Experience the best of apartment living at Saint Émilion. Luxury apartments with premium amenities in a prime Kanata setting.
- [The Cristina Apartments - Modern and Elegant Living in Smith Falls](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/thecristina): Discover modern elegance at The Cristina. Luxury apartments with top-tier amenities, located in Smith Falls.
- [The Normand Apartments - Elegant Living with Top Amenities in Kanata](https://www.lepineapartments.com/property/thenormand): Discover luxury living at The Normand. Elegant apartments with top amenities in a vibrant Kanata neighborhood.
- [Les Jardins Francoise Apartments Coming Soon - Luxury Living in Orleans](https://www.lepineapartments.com/comingsoon/lesjardinsfrancoise): Les Jardins Francoise: Coming soon to Orleans. Luxury apartments with modern designs and premium amenities.
- [René’s Court Apartments Coming Soon - Stittsville Apartment Rentals](https://www.lepineapartments.com/comingsoon/renescourt): René's Court: Luxury apartments coming soon to Stittsville. Stay tuned for premium living spaces with top-notch amenities and modern designs.
